subTitleText2: We help private clients, state-owned companies, small and large businesses to decide legal issues of any complexity.
subTitleText1: We help to anticipate the necessary changes and thus avoid difficult situations in the future.

appointmentForm.privacyTitle: I grant permission for the processing of personal data.
appointmentForm.secondTitle: Make an appointment for a consultation
appointmentForm.successText: You have successfully signed up for a consultation. We will contact you shortly.
appointmentForm.failureText: There was an error. Please choose another consultation date.
